BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Borda>@Borda</denchmark-link>
  These lines failed to upload. Commented out for this release:
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/williamFalcon/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/setup.py#L50-L51>https://github.com/williamFalcon/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/setup.py#L50-L51</denchmark-link>
 
 Please run twine check dist/* to see the issues

comments_0.comment_text:
Ok, I see... I will try to fix it...
 <denchmark-code>Checking distribution dist/pytorch_lightning-0.5.3-py3.6.egg: warning: `long_description_content_type` missing.  defaulting to `text/x-rst`.
 Failed
 The project's long_description has invalid markup which will not be rendered on PyPI. The following syntax errors were detected:
 line 80: Warning: Inline literal start-string without end-string.
 </denchmark-code>

comments_1.comment_text:
seems to be similar to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pypa/twine/issues/454>pypa/twine#454</denchmark-link>
  and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pypa/twine/issues/495>pypa/twine#495</denchmark-link>
  and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pypa/twine/issues/479>pypa/twine#479</denchmark-link>
 
 also here - <denchmark-link:https://gitmemory.com/issue/pypa/twine/454/508880105>https://gitmemory.com/issue/pypa/twine/454/508880105</denchmark-link>
 
 I am preparing the fix in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Borda/pytorch-lightning/tree/issue_468>https://github.com/Borda/pytorch-lightning/tree/issue_468</denchmark-link>
  :)

comments_2.comment_text:
with upgrading to twine==2.0 I got following error
 <denchmark-code>Checking dist/pytorch-lightning-0.5.3.tar.gz: FAILED
   `long_description` has syntax errors in markup and would not be rendered on PyPI.
     line 80: Error: Unexpected indentation.
   warning: `long_description_content_type` missing.  defaulting to `text/x-rst`.
 </denchmark-code>
 
 but the setup.py contains:
 <denchmark-code>long_description=open('README.md', encoding='utf-8').read(),
 long_description_content_type='text/markdown',
 </denchmark-code>
